name: Gas/Oil Calculator
description: Tired of calculating how much to add oil to petrol for two-stroke engine, then this app is for You!  Features:   Super fast calculation in liters, US gallons, Imperial gallons  Fastest flashlight in the dark (if device supports flash)  The program remembers the last entered data as the amount of fuel and the ratio  Recommendations engine manual  Modern design  No longer need to calculate in my head how to add oil to the gas! Use our program for any two-stroke equipment: motor boats, chainsaws, lawn mowers, mopeds etc.
